function fixFleXHeight(containerName)
{
	var container = Co.Tools.GetElement("scrollingItems_" + containerName);
	var countItems = 0;
	if (container == null)
		return;

	var itemHeight = 0;
	var maxVisibleItems = parseInt(container.getAttribute("maxvisibleitems"));
	for (var i = 0; i < container.childNodes.length; i++)
	{
		if (container.childNodes[i].nodeType == 1)
			countItems++;
	}
	var itemHeight = container.clientHeight / countItems;
	var totalHeight = itemHeight * maxVisibleItems;
	if (totalHeight > container.clientHeight)
		totalHeight = container.clientHeight;

	var setHeight = Math.round(totalHeight);
	var flexcrollDiv = Co.Tools.GetElement("flexcroll_" + containerName);
	flexcrollDiv.style.height = (setHeight + 3) + "px";

	if (Co.BrowserInfo.IsIE)
		fleXenv.fleXcrollMain(flexcrollDiv);
}"></script>

<script type="text/javascript" src="$j(function() {
	$j(document).on("click", ".js-share-popup", function() {
		window.open(this.dataset.shareUrl, '_blank', 'width=400,height=500');
	});
});

$j(function() {

	window.Co.PageTools = {
		_lastScrollY: null,
		_ticking: false
	};

	Co.PageTools.Container = $j(".js-page-tools-sidebar");

	Co.PageTools.MobileToggleHandler = function (stateIntent, speed) {
		if (typeof stateIntent !== "boolean") {
			stateIntent = !Co.PageTools.Container.hasClass("--open");
		}
		
		if (stateIntent) {
			$j(".js-page-tools-menu").stop().slideDown(speed);
			$j(document).on("click.closePageTools", function (e) {
				if (Co.PageTools.Container.has(e.target).length) {
					return;
				}
				$j(document).off("click.closePageTools");
				Co.PageTools.MobileToggleHandler(false);
			});
			//Adds print functionality to mobile without using the hide image dialog; make sure handler is added only once
			$j(".fa-print").off("click").click(function ()
			{
				Co.Tools.Print(window);
			});

		} else {
			$j(".js-page-tools-menu").stop().slideUp(speed);
			$j(document).off("click.closePageTools");
		}

		Co.PageTools.Container.toggleClass("--open", stateIntent);
	};

	// This is the element that we'll use to enforce a bottom limit on the floating PageTools (for desktop);
	// Fallback elements exist in case #ContentBody doesn't exist (i.e., anything besides Content.master).
	var contentBottomEl = $j("#ContentBody")[0] || $j("#co_content_container")[0] || $j("#content")[0];
	// Element for top limit. Use the full-width image, if that doesn't exist, use the same body container that we use for the bottom limit.
	var contentTopEl = $j(".hero_wrapper")[0] || contentBottomEl;
	Co.PageTools.UpdatePosition = function() {

		/*
			150 is a bit of magic number
			The bounds.top is because there might be a header/image/wtvr above the content container, 
			and we don't want to fix the sidebar until we've scrolled past it.
		*/
		var offsetTop = 150;
		if (Co.IsMobilePage || Co.IsResponsive && window.innerWidth < 975) {
			Co.PageTools.Container.css("top", "auto");
			var lastScrollY = Co.PageTools._lastScrollY;
			if (lastScrollY !== null && window.scrollY !== lastScrollY) {
				var scrollingDown = window.scrollY > Co.PageTools._lastScrollY;
				Co.PageTools.Container.toggleClass('--scrolling-down', scrollingDown);

				if (scrollingDown) {
					$j(".js-page-tools-menu").slideUp(0);
					Co.PageTools.MobileToggleHandler(false, 0);
				}
			}
			Co.PageTools._lastScrollY = window.scrollY;
			Co.PageTools._ticking = false;
		} else {
			// If this was a responsive page, then we might be waiting for a click out to collapse the PageTools (if we rendered mobile view). So let's disable that.
			$j(document).off("click.closePageTools");

			var contentTop = contentTopEl.getBoundingClientRect().top;
			var contentBottom = contentBottomEl.getBoundingClientRect().bottom;

			var sidebarBounds = Co.PageTools.Container[0].getBoundingClientRect();
			var windowHeight = Math.max(document.documentElement.clientHeight, window.innerHeight || 0);

			var contentTopIsVisible = contentTop >= offsetTop;
			var contentBottomIsVisible = contentBottom <= windowHeight;
			var sidebarIsHiddenUp = sidebarBounds.top < offsetTop;
			var sidebarIsAtOrBelowContent = sidebarBounds.bottom >= contentBottom;

			var newTop = null;

			if (contentTopIsVisible) {
				//stuck at top of content
				newTop = contentTop;
			} else {

				if (contentBottomIsVisible && (sidebarIsAtOrBelowContent || sidebarIsHiddenUp)) {
					// pin the sidebar to the bottom of content
					newTop = contentBottom - sidebarBounds.height;
				} else if (contentTop <= offsetTop && (contentBottom >= (sidebarBounds.height + offsetTop))) {
					// pin the sidebar to 150px from the viewport top
					newTop = offsetTop;
				}
			}

			var shouldUpdate = true;
			// sidebar is already out of view. No need to keep moving it up.
			if (sidebarBounds.bottom < 0 && newTop <= sidebarBounds.top) {
				shouldUpdate = false;
			}
			// This can be tweaked, but basically ensure that the newTop is going to place the sidebar within the document.body's limits
			if (newTop !== null && !(newTop > -document.body.scrollHeight && newTop < document.body.scrollHeight)) {
				shouldUpdate = false;
			}

			if (shouldUpdate)
				Co.PageTools.Container.css({ top: newTop });


			Co.PageTools._ticking = false;
		};
	};
	var handler = function (e) {
		// Only request one frame at a time
		if (!Co.PageTools._ticking) {
			requestAnimationFrame(Co.PageTools.UpdatePosition);
		}
		Co.PageTools._ticking = true;
	}


	window.addEventListener('scroll', handler);
	window.addEventListener('resize', Co.PageTools.UpdatePosition);

	Co.PageTools.UpdatePosition();

	//The FAB is not always visible, but if it is, this should work.
	$j(document).on("click", ".js-fab-wrapper", Co.PageTools.MobileToggleHandler);
});
		
function coPrint(e, parentId) {
	e.preventDefault();

	var form = document.forms["print-form"];
	
	var printGreen = form["print-green"].checked;

	if (printGreen)
		Co.Cookie.Set("cdo_pg", printGreen, { ExpirationDate: new Date().addDays(365) });
	else
		Co.Cookie.Remove("cdo_pg");

	//used "GetSelectedItem" for compatibility with browsers that dont return the value on the collection.
	var printSeries = form["print-series"] ? Co.Forms.GetSelectedItem(form["print-series"]).value === "true" : false;

	Co.Tools.Print(window, (printSeries ? "&complete=true" : null), printGreen, parentId);
	return false;
}

$j(function() {
	//If print-form doesn't exist, (because the print button doesn't exist on this page) we shouldn't error.
	((document.forms["print-form"] || {})["print-green"] || {}).checked = Co.Cookie.Get("cdo_pg");
});"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="Co.DomEvents.AddListener(window, 'domload', function ()
{
	var SiteWideAds = document.getElementById('SiteWideAds');
	if (SiteWideAds == null)
		return;
	var swa = Co.Cookie.Get("swa");
	if (swa === -1)
		return;
	
	if (swa > 0)
	{
		Co.Settings.HideSiteBanner = true;
		/* Get rid of items that are allowed to be hidden (default) */
		$j(".sitewide_ad:not(:has(.js-always-show))").remove();
		swa -= 1;
		var expirationDate = new Date(new Date().setDate(new Date().getDate() + 30)); //30 days
		Co.Cookie.Set("swa", swa, { Path: "/", ExpirationDate: expirationDate });
		if ($j(".sitewide_ads").children().length === 0)
		{
			$j(".sitewide_ads").parent().remove();
			return;
		}
	}
	setTimeout(function ()
	{
		if (SiteWideAds)
		{
			var container = SiteWideAds.firstChild;
			while (container && container.nodeType != 1)
				container = container.nextSibling;
			var height = container.offsetHeight;
			var style = 'height:' + height + 'px;';
			SiteWideAds.setAttribute('style', style);
			
			$j(document).trigger('ads-added.cdo', {height: height});
		}
	}, 1000);
});
SiteWideAdsCloseButtonClick = function (ev, button)
{
	var expirationDate = new Date(new Date().setDate(new Date().getDate() + 30)); //30 days
	Co.Cookie.Set("swa", "30", { Path: "/", ExpirationDate: expirationDate });
	var style = 'border-top-width:0px;border-right-width:0px;border-bottom-width:0px;border-left-width:0px;height:0px;';
	document.getElementById( 'SiteWideAds' ).setAttribute( 'style', style );
	setTimeout(function ()
	{
		var elm = document.getElementById('SiteWideAds');
		elm.parentNode.removeChild(elm);
		// This event is used by chabad-finder to update map position when ads are removed.
		$j(document).trigger('ads-removed.cdo')
	}, 1000);
	Co.Settings.HideSiteBanner = true;
	TrackClick( 'sitewide-ads', button.id, document.location.href );
};"></script><script>$j = $j.fn ? $j : jQuery;$j(function(){$j.each($q,function(i,f){try{f.call(window);}catch(ex){console.error(ex);}});})</script>

<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
$j = jQuery.noConflict(); //prevent conflict with prototype, mootools javascript libraries
var cssNeeded = true;
var link, script;
var localNavigationJsNeeded = true;
var local_navigation_visible = false, closeEventAdded = false;
Co.DomEvents.AddListener(window, "domload", function ()
{
if (typeof (KidsSfx) == "undefined")
{
KidsSfx =
{
Sounds:
{
"sound1": null,
"sound2": null,
"sound3": null,
"sound4": null,
"sound5": null
}
};
KidsSfx.Initialize = function ()
{
for (var s in this.Sounds)
{
var sound = document.getElementById(s);
if (sound != null)
this.Sounds[s] = sound;
}
};
KidsSfx.PlaySound = function (InstanceId)
{
if (typeof (InstanceId) != "undefined" && typeof (this.Sounds[InstanceId]) != "undefined")
{
this.Sounds[InstanceId].currentTime = 0;
this.Sounds[InstanceId].volume = 0.1;
if (typeof (this.Sounds[InstanceId].play) != "undefined") {
this.Sounds[InstanceId].play();
}
return true;
}
return false;
};
KidsSfx.Initialize();
Co.Events.GlobalEvents.AddEventListener("kidssfx_playsound", KidsSfx.PlaySound, KidsSfx);
}
toggleNavigation();
Co.DomEvents.AddListener(window, 'resize', function ()
{
toggleNavigation();
});
$j('#header_container #logo.topBarLink a').click(function ()
{
window.location.href = '/kids/default.asp';
return false;
});
$j('#header_container #logo.topBarLink a img').css('display', 'none');
$j('#header_container #logo.topBarLink a').css('display', 'block');
$j('#header_container #logo.topBarLink a').css('height', '45px'); 
});
function toggleNavigation()
{
var size = Co.Tools.GetViewPaneSize();
var orientation = "";
if (size.Height > size.Width)
orientation = "portrait";
else if (size.Width > size.Height)
orientation = "landscape";
var mobileView = false;
if (orientation == "portrait")
mobileView = size.Width <= 768;
else if (orientation == "landscape")
mobileView = size.Width <= 1023;
if( !mobileView && Co.BrowserInfo.IsMobileDevice() )
{
mobileView = true;
cssNeeded = false;
}
if (mobileView)
{ 
if (localNavigationJsNeeded)
{
localNavigationJsNeeded = false;
//if ($j('.co_local_menu').length)
//{
// $j('#BodyContainer').css('marginTop', '3px');
// $j('#BodyContainer .body_wrapper').css('paddingTop', '0');
//}
$j(".co_local_menu").addClass("clearfix no_left_margin");
$j(".co_local_menu .body").css("position", "relative");
$j(".co_local_menu .body").append('<div class="bottom_close"><div class="background"></div></div>');
var height = $j(".co_local_menu .body").innerHeight();
$j(".co_local_menu .body").css("height", "0px");
$j(".co_local_menu .body").css("overflow", "hidden");
$j(".co_local_menu .header").addClass("close");
//toggle local navigtion on click of header
$j(".co_local_menu .header").click(function() {
toggleLocalNavigation($j(".co_local_menu .body"), local_navigation_visible, height);
return false;
});
}
if (cssNeeded)
{
cssNeeded = false;
link = document.createElement('link');
link.setAttribute("rel", "stylesheet");
link.setAttribute("type", "text/css");
link.href = '/css/mobile.css';
var links = document.getElementsByTagName('link');
var firstKidsLink = null;
for (var x = 0; x < links.length; x++)
{
var href = links[x].getAttribute('href');
if (href && href.indexOf('/kids') != -1)
{
firstKidsLink = links[x];
break;
}
}
if (firstKidsLink != null)
document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].insertBefore(link, firstKidsLink);
}
var navigation = Co.Tools.GetElementsByClassName('navigation', 'div', document.body)[0];
var button = document.getElementById('loginHeaderContainer');
if (navigation && button)
{
if (!Co.DomEvents.HasListener(button, 'click'))
{
Co.DomEvents.AddListener(button, 'click', function() {
if (document.body.className.indexOf('open') == -1)
Co.Tools.Content.AppendClassName(document.body, 'open');
else
Co.Tools.Content.RemoveClassName(document.body, 'open');
});
}
if (!Co.DomEvents.HasListener(document.getElementById('BodyContainer'), 'click'))
{
Co.DomEvents.AddListener(document.getElementById('BodyContainer'), 'click', function() {
if (document.body.className.indexOf('open') != -1)
Co.Tools.Content.RemoveClassName(document.body, 'open');
});
}
var footer = Co.Tools.GetElementsByClassName('footer_wrapper', 'DIV', document.body)[0];
if (!Co.DomEvents.HasListener(footer, 'click'))
{
Co.DomEvents.AddListener(footer, 'click', function() {
if (document.body.className.indexOf('open') != -1)
Co.Tools.Content.RemoveClassName(document.body, 'open');
});
}
}
}
else
{
if (typeof(link) != 'undefined' && link != null)
{
document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].removeChild(link);
cssNeeded = true;
if (!localNavigationJsNeeded)
{
//if ($j('.co_local_menu').length)
//{
// $j('#BodyContainer').css('marginTop', '5px');
// $j('#BodyContainer .body_wrapper').css('paddingTop', '15px');
//}
$j(".co_local_menu").removeClass("clearfix no_left_margin");
$j(".co_local_menu .body").css("position", "relative");
$j(".co_local_menu .body .bottom_close").remove();
$j(".co_local_menu .body").css("height", "auto");
$j(".co_local_menu .body").css("overflow", "auto");
$j(".co_local_menu .header").removeClass("close");
$j(".co_local_menu .header").removeClass("open");
$j(".co_local_menu .body").css("display", "block");
}
localNavigationJsNeeded = true;
}
}
}
//toggle local navigtion
function toggleLocalNavigation(obj, isVisible, height)
{
if (!isVisible)
{
if ($j(obj).css("display") == "none")
$j(obj).css("display", "block");
$j(obj).animate({ height: (height + 2) }, 200, function ()
{
local_navigation_visible = true;
$j(".co_local_menu .header").removeClass("close");
$j(".co_local_menu .header").addClass("open");
$j(".co_local_menu .body .bottom_close").css("display", "block");
if (!closeEventAdded)
{
$j(".co_local_menu .body .bottom_close").click(function ()
{
toggleLocalNavigation($j(".co_local_menu .body"), true, 0);
});
closeEventAdded = true;
}
});
}
else
{
$j(".co_local_menu .body .bottom_close").css("display", "none");
$j(obj).animate({ height: 0 }, 200, function ()
{
$j(".co_local_menu .header").removeClass("open");
$j(".co_local_menu .header").addClass("close");
local_navigation_visible = false;
});
}
}
</script>

}
